General.Name: Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited
General.Description: Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the interior design, decoration, exhibition, and events businesses in Thailand. The company offers retail and corporate interior services, including retail interiors, roll-outs, retail fixtures, corporate interiors, and restaurants; and exhibitions and event services, such as custom-designed stands, official shows and event services. It also provides thematic and museums comprising galleries and visitor centers, and museums; as well as event management and equipment rental services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.
General.Address: 9/19 Moo 7, Lam Luk Ka, Bangkok, Thailand, 12150
